mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hardcastle, S. W. to Herman Doepner regarding enclosed and reprint; 01 of 30
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 1-40--Scrapbook 1Hardcastle, S. W. to Herman Doepner regarding the enclosed materials, the possible reprint of William Herschel's book "The Origin of Fingerprinting" and costs of the reprint. Enclosed: Newspaper clipping "Finger Print Author's Will" (unknown source)--Newspaper article "Slough and Science of Finger-Prints, Centenary of Discoverer's Birth", The Slough, Eton & Windsor Observer, Fri 01/20/1933--Handwritten and typed extracts and originals of letters to Herschel from Francis Galton (1888, 1890, 1895), Edward Henry (1916), and Bengal Government papers (1893). ; 16 leaves; DF 1212
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
Galton, Francis, Sir, 18221911
Herschel, William, Sir, 17381822
